Package adrenaline.server.controller.states

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FiremodeSubState
    The FiremodeSubState interface, made for handling the different weapon effects
    GameState
    The game state interface made to realize State pattern at game flow
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AvatarSelectionState
    This is Avatar Selection State to do the select avatar operation from Player
    FireAreaState
    Handles an area target fire action.
    FirePlayerState
    Handles a player/s target fire action.
    FreneticActionState
    The FreneticActionState to do the final frenetic
    glFiremodeState
    Implements the Grenade Launcher firemode.
    GrabState
    The grab state to do all operation of grab action
    MoveEnemyState
    Handles a player/s target fire action where the enemies are moved before applying the damage.
    MoveSelfState
    Allows the player to move during a fire action, for weapons that permit it.
    NewtonState
    The new state to implement NewTon power up card's action
    ReloadState
    The reload state to do reload action
    RespawnState
    The respawn state made for the player who dead.
    RunState
    The run state to do all ran actions
    ScopeState
    The Scope State to do all scope action
    SelectActionState
    SelectActionState to do select action operations
    SelectFreneticActionState
    The SelectFreneticActionState to do the select Frenetic mode action operations
    SettingsVoteState
    The SettingsVoteState to set map for players' selection
    ShootState
    The shoot state to do all shoot operations
    TeleportState
    The TeleportState made for Teleport powerup card
    WeaponGrabState
    WeaponGrabState to do grab weapon actions
